title: Browns' Judkins facing domestic violence charge
content: Cleveland Browns rookie running back Quinshon Judkins was arrested on a domestic violence and battery charge in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, on Saturday, according to the Fort Lauderdale Police Department and Broward County arrest records.

title: Sources: Anthony bought out, looks to join Bucks
content: Cole Anthony agreed to a contract buyout with the Memphis Grizzlies, and the 25-year-old guard plans to sign with the Milwaukee Bucks after he clears waivers, sources told ESPN on Saturday night.

title: Sharpe, 3-time Pro Bowl LT for Cardinals, dies
content: Longtime Cardinals left tackle Luis Sharpe, a three-time Pro Bowler who spent his entire 13-year NFL career with the franchise, has died at age 65.

title: Messi extends historic streak with 2 more goals
content: Lionel Messi extended his MLS-record streak of multigoal games as he scored twice in Inter Miami's win over Nashville.

title: Kim wins Evian in playoff for 1st LPGA major title
content: Grace Kim delivered one stunning shot after another Sunday in the Evian Championship to win her first major title.

title: Stevenson keeps belt with decision win vs. Zepeda
content: Shakur Stevenson couldn't score a knockout blow against William Zepeda but put together a boxing clinic to retain his WBC lightweight title with a unanimous decision Saturday night in Queens, N.Y.

title: FIFA, players agree to mandatory rest periods
content: Player unions secured an apparent victory in their battle for mandatory rest periods after a meeting in New York with FIFA president Gianni Infantino.

title: MLB mock draft 3.0: Kiley McDaniel predicts the first two rounds
content: The MLB draft is Sunday! And this year, the drama starts with the Washington Nationals at the No. 1 pick.

title: How do Chelsea, PSG compare? Who will win the final?
content: One of Chelsea or PSG will win the first expanded Club World Cup on Sunday, so how do they match up ahead of the final?

title: Who are the NFL's best offensive tackles? Execs, coaches and scouts help rank 2025's top 10
content: Who are the best offensive tackles in the NFL? We asked execs, coaches and scouts to rank their top 10 in our annual summer series.

title: Remembering Arthur Ashe's historic 1975 Wimbledon title
content: Stan Smith, Richard Evans and Chris Eubanks reflect on the 50th anniversary of Arthur Ashe's Wimbledon victory.

title: How Iga Swiatek defied all expectations to win her first Wimbledon title
content: After an early exit at her favorite Slam last month, Swiatek rebounded on her worst surface to take the Wimbledon title.

title: Snoop Dogg helps Swansea poke fun at Wrexham with kit launch
content: Not to be outdone by Wrexham's Hollywood glamour, Swansea City enlisted Snoop Dogg to unveil their new jersey and take a shot at their Welsh rivals.

title: Why LeBron and the Lakers are stuck in limbo
content: For months, publicly and privately, the Lakers have been signaling their desire to begin the Luka Doncic era in Los Angeles, even if it meant ending the LeBron James one.

title: The unstoppable power of Jim Abbott's legacy
content: Abbott, who pitched in the majors with one hand, remains a beacon for families with unique struggles.

title: Gyökeres warned with fines after going on strike
content: Sporting CP president Frederico Varandas has insisted that Viktor Gyökeres will face fines after he went on strike Saturday, refusing to report to the club's preseason training.

title: Liverpool remember Jota in emotional first friendly
content: Liverpool and Preston North End players, staff and supporters paid tribute to Diogo Jota during their preseason friendly on Sunday.

title: Infantino: Covered stadiums to be used at '26 WC
content: FIFA President Gianni Infantino said stadiums with roofs will be used to ease concerns over severe weather at the 2026 Men's World Cup.

title: Not done yet: Cazorla, 40, inks new Oviedo deal
content: Santi Cazorla will be back in LaLiga next season after signing a new contract with newly promoted Real Oviedo.

title: LaLiga boss rejects Madrid plea to extend break
content: LaLiga president Javier Tebas rejected Real Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois' plea to postpone the team's 2025-26 league opener to give players time to rest following the Club World Cup.

title: Louis van Gaal 'no longer bothered by cancer'
content: Louis van Gaal has said he is "no longer bothered by cancer" and is keen for a return to the higher levels of the game.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Bayern turn to Trossard after Luis Diaz move stalls
content: Bayern Munich will turn to Arsenal forward Leandro Trossard if a move for Liverpool's Luis Díaz falls through. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Tillman to Leverkusen: Can USMNT star fill void left by Wirtz?
content: Malik Tillman is coming off a career year and Bayer Leverkusen are in transition. Is this a perfect match?

title: Euro 2025 Daily: Sweden demolish Germany, Poland make history
content: Sweden topped Group C with a commanding win over Germany. Here's everything you need to know about Euro 2025 action.

title: Missing For 6 Days, Delhi University Student's Body Found In Yamuna River
content: A 19-year-old student of Delhi University who went missing six days ago has been found dead in the Yamuna River, the police said. The student, Sneha Debnath, was a resident of Tripura. Her family has identified her body, the police said.

title: Video: Swiggy Delivery Agent Assaulted On Busy Bengaluru Road
content: A Swiggy delivery executive was brutally assaulted by three unidentified men at a traffic signal near Modi Hospital Junction in Bengaluru late last night, showed a video in another disturbing case of road rage.

title: Karnataka Congress MLA Pitches Nitin Gadkari For PM, Cites RSS Age-Limit Remark
content: Karnataka Congress MLA Belur Gopalakrishna has suggested Union Minister Nitin Gadkari as the ideal successor to Prime Minister Narendra Modi, should he step down on turning 75 years of age.

title: How India's FGD Shift Will Cut Electricity Cost By 25-30 Paise Per Unit
content: The government's move to ease sulphur emission rules for most coal-fired power plants strikes a delicate balance between costs, climate and compliance and is expected to cut electricity costs by 25-30 paise per unit, officials said on Sunday.

title: "Inexcusable" Failures Led To Trump Assassination Attempt: Senate Report
content: A congressional inquiry into the attempt to assassinate US President Donald Trump at a campaign rally a year ago on Sunday lamented "inexcusable" failures in the Secret Service's operations and response.

title: Amid Air India Probe, US Aviation Body, Boeing Say Fuel Switch Locks Safe: Report
content: The US Federal Aviation Administration and Boeing have privately issued notifications that the fuel switch locks on Boeing planes are safe, with the FAA saying they are safe, a document seen by Reuters showed.

title: PM Modi Asked Me If He Should Speak In Marathi Or Hindi: Ujjwal Nikam
content: Noted lawyer Ujjwal Nikam, who is among four persons nominated to Rajya Sabha by President Droupadi Murmu, on Sunday said PM Modi called him to inform the news.

title: "She Played All Over The World": Radhika Yadav's Family Counters "Restrictions" Charge
content: The family of Radhika Yadav, who was shot dead at her Gurugram home allegedly by her father, placed "no restrictions" on the 25-year-old as she travelled the world playing tennis, said two of her cousins.

title: "Tyranny Of Unelected": Omar Abdullah On Being "Locked Up" Inside House
content: Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah alleged that he has been "locked up" inside his house soon after he returned from Delhi this evening.

title: Ink Attack On Maratha Outfit Leader Sparks Row, BJP Leader Allegedly Involved
content: Maratha outfit Sambhaji Brigade's state president, Pravin Gaikwad, was attacked with black ink during an event organised by the Fattesingh Education Institute and Sakal Maratha Samaj in Akkalkot, Solapur.

title: Mumbai Man With Upset Stomach Falls To Death From 18th Floor While Defecating
content: A 52-year-old man with an upset stomach died after falling from the 18th floor of a building here on Sunday while defecating from the edge of a shaft, an official said.

title: Rain Lashes Parts Of Delhi, Weather Office Issues Red Alert
content: Parts of the city were lashed by rain on Sunday evening, bringing relief from the humid weather. The weather department has issued a red alert for more showers over the next few hours and throughout Monday.

title: Bangladesh Trying To Sweeten Ties? Yunus Sends Mangoes To PM Modi
content: Professor Muhammad Yunus, the head of Bangladesh's interim government, has initiated 'mango diplomacy' with India, weeks after the Foreign Ministry said New Delhi was willing to discuss all issues with Dhaka in a "conducive" environment.

title: "Even Today, Bharat LooksSaare Jahan Se Accha": Shux At His Space Farewell
content: India looks full of ambition, fearless, confident and full of pride from space, astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla said on Sunday.

title: Lawyer Shot Dead In Patna, 3rd Murder In Full Public View In A Week
content: A lawyer was shot dead on a road in full public view just 300 metres away from a police station in Bihar's capital Patna. This was the third brazen high-profile murder case in a week in the state where the assembly election is just months away.

title: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi Alleges "Horse Trading" Within Congress In Karnataka
content: With a Congress MLA claiming that the BJP was planning to topple the government in Karnataka and has prepared a list to target 55 legislators through central agencies, Union Minister Pralhad Joshi on Sunday hit back.

title: "It's Been 6 Days": Missing 19-Year-Old's Family Alleges Police Inaction
content: Najeeb Ahmed, a 27-year-old student at Jawaharlal Nehru University in Delhi, went missing in 2016. He has not been found till date. Now, Sneha Debnath, a 19-year-old student of Delhi University, has been missing for six days.

title: Children Fetching Water Among 43 Killed By Israeli Strikes In Gaza Amid Truce Talks Deadlock
content: At least 10 people, including eight children, were killed by an Israeli missile in central Gaza, while they were waiting in a queue at a water distribution point, emergency service officials said.

title: Manipur Insurgent Groups Modifying Looted Weapons Into Snipers Rifles
content: Manipur's ethnic insurgent groups from both the Meitei and Kuki communities are modifying weapons, many of them looted from police armouries in 2023, and converting them into makeshift sniper rifles

title: "Feel Like Failure": Missing Delhi University Student's Family Finds A Note
content: The disappearance of a 19-year-old Delhi University student, whose last known location was the Signature Bridge, has put the spotlight on the gaps in CCTV coverage of the national capital's streets

title: Concerns grow as Kerala reports sixth Nipah case within a year
content: Palakkad and Malappuram districts on tenterhooks after a 58-year-old man who had died at a private hospital at Perinthalmanna tested positive for the virus

title: ‘ U.S. donkey route’ case: human traffickers also used fake visas
content: During the searches so far, the ED says it has seized forged emigration stamps of various foreign countries, visa templates, various other related papers, and digital devices

title: Indian fertilizer majors sign deal with Saudi Arabia firm Ma’aden
content: The agreements will ensure supply of 3.1 million MT of DAP (Diammonium Phosphate) fertilizer per annum for five years from 2025-26 onwards

title: Today’s India looks ambitious, fearless, confident, and full of pride, says astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla
content: ‘Back from here, I carry with me a lot of memories, but one thing that really sticks to me is what humanity is capable of when all of us come together from different parts of the world and work for a common goal,’ the Indian astronaut said ahead of his return to Earth

title: Mamata to lead protest on July 16 against targeting of Bengali migrants
content: Trinamool Congress to stage Statewide demonstrations amid reports of alleged harassment in BJP-ruled States

title: A thunderous finale to the National Percussion Festival
content: The final day programmes began with a stunning performance of Pandi Melam by Peruvanam Kuttan Marar and ensemble

title: Kolkata police constitute SIT to probe into rape of women by student on IIM-C campus
content: A 26-year-old student has been booked and arrested based on a complaint by a mental health counsellor of rape on the campus. The police have sought the footage of CCTV inside the IIM-C premises

title: Micro-industries will be set up in each Assembly constituency for economic empowerment of women: Deputy CM Mallu Bhatti Vikramarka
content: Criticises BRS for abandoning interest-free loans for women, which were introduced by the successive Congress governments in the past; says the govt. has distributed interest-free loans worth ₹21,600 crore in the form of cheques to women’s SHGs in the first year itself

title: Ramesh Chennithala alleges massive irregularities in Anert solar projects, demands audit and probe by Assembly panel
content: The Congress leader cites instances where price differences of as much as 50% have occurred in the implementation of solar power projects of comparable capacity through different private firms.

title: Andhra Pradesh Energy Minister Gottipati Ravi Kumar rules out hike in power tariffs
content: Accusing the previous YSRCP government of failing to generate a single megawatt during its term, the Minister says that the NDA dispensation is focused on promoting large-scale green energy projects, particularly in the Rayalaseema region

title: New bus terminus at Panjapur will become operational from July 16, says Minister
content: Tender for operation and maintenance of the terminus has been finalised and the chosen company will pay ₹50 lakh a year to the Corporation and get the right to collect rent from shops and entry fee from bus operators

title: Residents raise alarm over neglected PHC and PWD quarters in Jeevan Bima Nagar
content: Broken furniture, bags of cement, and abandoned vehicles clutter the premises of PHC and PWD quarters

title: 14 held in EAGLE decoy operation in Gachibowli
content: One of the customers came with his wife and four-year-old son. In another case, a couple who attempted to buy marijuana tested positive.

title: Raj Bhavan, Kerala government set for another face-off over foot worship at schools
content: Governor says ‘gurupuja’ is an integral part of Indian society and if such practices are set aside, the very existence of society will be affected. Education Minister Sivankutty says directives are being issued to all school authorities that no student in any school in Kerala should be made to wash the feet of teachers or anyone else

title: Government ready to clear doubts regarding revised timing in high schools: V. Sivankutty
content: Current objections against time revision were suspicious given that similar revisions in the past were not met with protests or disputes, says Minister

title: Monsoon treks near Visakhapatnam: Explore scenic Eastern Ghats trails
content: Monsoon treks near Visakhapatnam lead explorers into remote terrains shaped by Nature and guided by indigenous knowledge

title: Tirupati MLA lauds services of Reach Global Foundation
content: Appealing to everyone to help the poor under the P4 programme, District Collector S. Venkateswar announces that he has adopted five families from Nakkala Colony

title: Bihari migrants in Bengaluru are in dilemma over SIR
content: Many said travelling back home to submit documents for Special Intensive Revision of the electoral rolls is not practical at this point in time

title: A.P. Space Policy aims at attracting investments of ₹25,000 crore in next 10 years
content: Leveraging on Central government’s National Space Programme, the State government intends to create an inclusive ecosystem for space sector participants, including start-ups, large enterprises, academic institutions, and global investors

title: India joins bilateral military exercise in Australia
content: Talisman Sabre exercise, now in its 11th iteration, brings together more than 35,000 military personnel from 19 nations

title: Youth Congress locks horns with veteran Congress leader P.J. Kurien
content: Kurien says Youth Congress leaders are seen only on television and are absent from ground-level struggles, contrasting them with SFI members who align with ‘disaffected youth.’ The comments draw strong reactions from Youth Congress State president and other leaders

title: Body shaming, forcing liquor and drugs, online ragging made punishable in Kerala draft anti-ragging bill
content: Kerala Prohibition of Ragging (Amendment) Bill, has also brought “any form of ragging committed through the internet or in any digital mode” under the ambit of the criminal act of ragging for which severe punishment has been prescribed.

title: Assam CM sniffs conspiracy behind landless people moving to areas dominated by ‘Hindus or Assamese Muslims’
content: The BJP-led government has attracted flak from Opposition parties for evicting Muslims with their roots in present-day Bangladesh from reserve forests and wetlands

title: Godavari floods affect over 3,000 people in Eluru district, relief camps set up with food, medical aid
content: District Collector directs officials to remain stationed at the camps and ensure safety in the villages until the waters recede

title: Collector slaps student during exam in MP's Bhind; says his 'strictness' busted mass copying racket
content: Bhind Collector slaps student in exam centre, exposing mass copying racket; sparks controversy and demands for inquiry

title: Nitish Kumar promises jobs, employment for one crore people in five years
content: In a social media post, the Bihar Chief Minister claimed that between 2005 and 2020, over eight lakh youth in the State were provided with government jobs

title: Ministry of Textiles engages experts to survey Uppada Jamdani saree weaving, aims to support handloom weavers in Andhra Pradesh
content: WSC-Chennai to assess challenges in the GI-registered craft; ₹15 crore aid proposed under NHDP for design revival, market access, and welfare of fisherfolk weavers, says Kakinada MP

title: Data bank of unused govt. land in Kozhikode to be prepared for LIFE Mission
content: Private landholders are also encouraged to cooperate with the scheme under the ‘Manassode Ithiri Mannu’ campaign in Kozhikode district

title: Tejashwi seeks to puncture ECI's claims on progress in Bihar SIR
content: We would like to know from the EC how many such migrants have been covered under the exercise, questions Leader of Opposition in State Assembly Tejashwi Yadav

title: An honour for Kerala too, says Sadanandan
content: The BJP leader who was nominated to Rajya Sabha says BJP Central leadership has always bestowed “special attention” on Kerala regardless of its electoral success here

title: Minister hails A.P. for winning 10 ODOP awards
content: While seven were for handlooms and handicraft products, two were in the agriculture sector, and one in the inter-state category

title: Heavy transport vehicles to be diverted to Panjapur truck terminal in Tiruchi
content: The Tiruchi Corporation has requested the police to enforce diversions and coordinate with transport operators to ensure the effective use of the new terminal

title: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu leading a high-level team to Singapore from July 26
content: It will explore possibilities of collaboration and learning in areas such as urban planning, city beautification, gardening, ports, and other logistics infra

title: Judiciary must perform role of catalyst for LGBTQIA+ rights: Former SC judge Sanjay Kishan Kaul
content: Justice (retd) Kaul said that anti-discrimination law was more crucial in today’s age, where access to capital was the requisite for access to capital.

title: Film producer Balaga Prakash alleges harassment by revenue officials over land deal
content: He seeks intervention from National Commission for Scheduled Castes in the issue; Tekkali RDO says he is acting as per rules

title: A'ja Wilson, Josh Allen among 2025 ESPYS candidates; vote now
content: the 2025 ESPYS presented by Capital One are July 16 . the Oklahoma City Thunder guard is nominated in two categories: Best Athlete - Men's Sports, and Best NBA Player . Simone Biles and Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone are up for best . Ilona Maher and Ezra Frech represent in both categories .

title: Katie Taylor fought the right fight at the right time against Amanda Serrano
content: women's boxing may not have the stage it had on Netflix in front of millions of viewers . she fought serrano's fight for the first 20 rounds of their trilogy . her coach and promoter advised her the first two times to not make the fights more difficult .

title: Shakur Stevenson showed that the fight in him is second to none
content: Shakur Stevenson beats William Zepeda to retain his WBC lightweight title . he was promoted to the co-main event of Ring Magazine 3 by Turki Alalshikh . the chairman of Saudi Arabia's general entertainment authority was elevated to the main event .

title: Phils rip MLB for Miz All-Star pick: 'What a joke'
content: multiple Phillies players ripped Major League Baseball's decision to add Jacob Misiorowski to the national league All-Star roster . the Brewers rookie has made just five starts for Milwaukee . he will replace Cubs pitcher Matthew Boyd on the NL roster, citing his lack of experience in the majors .

title: Who dropped out of the top 10? Players eyeing a bounce-back at TE, RB and Edge
content: sportsmail's survey of the top 10 players at every position is unveiled . we'll collect those names here as the top-10 for each position is revealed . more than 70 voters submitted a ballot on at least one position, and in many cases all positions .

title: 🎵 Drake reveals SGA tattoo, covers up LeBron
content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander appears to be taking leBron James ' spot, but not on the court . he previously had a tattoo of the Los Angeles Lakers superstar's St. Vincent/St. Mary's jersey on the outside of his left arm with the no. 23 .

title: Draft tracker live updates: Order, results, analysis for every first-round pick
content: the 2025 MLB draft begins at 6 p.m. ET on ESPN . will the nationals opt for a high school star infielder Ethan Holliday? who will be the biggest steals -- and stretches -- of day 1?

title: Over 92% engineering seats filled in mock allotment
